author: Anonymous Helix
title: Canvas Course
question:
Hi, has anybody been able to see this course's canvas page? I'm a bit confused because we've gotten emails and have access to piazza but I can't seem to find the Canvas page.
Thanks!
student_answer: I don't believe the course is active yet, at least from my end!
instructor_answer: Please re-read the first and second paragraphs of the email we sent.  From there you will know how to find the information to answer this question.
